title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. B, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 515 - Standards For Appellate And State Post-conviction Counsel In Capital Cases
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. B, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 515 - Standards For Appellate And State Post-conviction Counsel In Capital Cases

State Regulations
§ 515.1 - Standards for appellate counsel in capital cases
§ 515.2 - Standards for State post-conviction counsel in capital cases

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. B, ch. I, subch. B, pt. 515

Statutory authority: N.Y.S. Constitution, art. VI, § 28[c]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
